# cxxopts Vendorized Copy

This directory contains a copy of the header-only library `cxxopts`.

- **Original Repository:** [https://github.com/jarro2783/cxxopts](https://github.com/jarro2783/cxxopts)
- **Version/Commit:** v3.3.1 (Commit `44380e5`)
- **License:** MIT License (See repository for full text)
- **Date Vendorized:** 2025-11-27

---
**DO NOT MODIFY** files in this directory directly. To update, replace the existing files with the new version from the source repository.
